Generation V.Black: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
Generation V.White: Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. They feel insecure without a lookout.
Generation V.Black 2: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.
Generation V.White 2: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.

Generation VI.X: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
Generation VI.Y: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.

Generation V.Black 2: Routes 19 and 20 , Floccesy Ranch , Virbank Complex
